name: podamShouldAllowValidationAnnotationsCustomization

testSteps.description: Given a Podam Factory with custom strategy uk.co.jemos.podam.test.strategies.PatternStrategy@1fb2720 for annotation interface javax.validation.constraints.Pattern
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ValidatedPatternPojo
Then the pojo uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ValidatedPatternPojo@1682825 must be of the type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ValidatedPatternPojo
Then the pojo 198602 must be of the type class java.lang.String
Then the pojo XZ0 must be of the type class java.lang.String
Then the POJO should not have any Validator violations for uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ValidatedPatternPojo@1682825
Remove a custom strategy interface javax.validation.constraints.Pattern from a Podam Factory

title: Podam should allow validation annotations customization
